paragraphs.body: Same picture for "bloodbending" and "specialized bending techniques". Any way to fix it?

paragraphs.body: Okay if im right Katara can bend ink in the southern raiders and sweat in one episode. and Katara and Toph both can bend mud (Toph bending the dirt and Katara bending the water). If it's ok can some one add this someone on the wiki. Oh yeah and there was the Jerk Bending joke just thought i bring that one up and Cry Bending from the play in the fire nation.Jackboog21 (wall • contribs) 07:40, October 2, 2013 (UTC)jackboog21
